headline: Ask HN: How to build a Climate Tech/Hardtech startup
description: Hey folks. I currently have a super cushy job in the valley but really want to quick my job and build something in the climate/energy hardtech space. My issue is that I have no experience building a startup or any experience in climate/energy. So my question is, how do I get started with an idea and build my first product in this space?
